tasks.name: Water any trees near your house
tasks.taskDescription: Attach the proof by submitting a photo of the tree with indications that it has been watered (wet soil, water drop on the leaf, or anything else.)

tasks.name: Turn off your room lights during the day
tasks.taskDescription: Attach the proof by submitting a photo of the lamp with indications that it has been turned off.
tasks.proofCaption: Turned off my bedroom lamp, I opened the window to get a natural light source instead.

tasks.name: Draw a circle on your forehead
tasks.taskDescription: Attach the proof by submitting a photo of your forehead with a massive permanent circle mark.
